name: Brown Sugar Bubble Milk Tea
description: The brown sugar is cooked for two hours and we use fresh whole milk to make the drink. Itâ€™s also one of our most popular drinks.

name: Original Milk Tea
description: A classic and smooth black milk tea made with fresh milk, customizable with your favorite toppings.

name: Taro Bubble Milk Tea
description: A creamy and sweet bubble tea with the unique, nutty flavor of real taro.

name: Thai Bubble Milk Tea
description: A rich and creamy milk tea made with authentic spiced Thai tea, giving it a distinct orange color.

name: Oreo Bubble Milk Tea
description: An indulgent and creamy blend of milk tea with crushed Oreo cookies for a delicious cookies and cream flavor.

name: Classic Milk Green Tea
description: A light and refreshing milk tea made with fragrant jasmine green tea for a delicate floral note.

name: Honey-peach Fruit Tea
description: Caffeine Free. A sweet and fruity tea bursting with the flavors of ripe peach and golden honey.

name: Passion Fruit Tea
description: A sweet and tangy iced tea infused with tropical passion fruit flavor and real seeds.

name: Super Fruit Green Tea
description: Fresh cut orange, lemon, lime, strawberry, and watermelon.

name: Grapefruit Green Tea
description: A zesty and refreshing green tea with the bright, tangy flavor of fresh grapefruit.

name: Honey Green Tea
description: A simple and soothing green tea naturally sweetened with a touch of golden honey.

name: Mango Fruit Tea
description: A sweet and tropical iced tea bursting with the flavor of fresh, ripe mango.

name: Strawberry Fruit Tea
description: A sweet and fruity iced tea made with real strawberry puree for a classic summer taste.

name: Cheese Foam Uji Matcha
description: Earthy Uji matcha topped with a creamy and slightly savory cheese foam for a perfect balance of flavors.

name: Cheese Foam Black Tea
description: Classic black iced tea topped with a creamy, rich, and slightly savory cheese foam.

name: Cheese Foam Green Tea
description: Light jasmine green tea topped with a creamy, rich, and slightly savory cheese foam.

name: Cheese Foam Strawberry Tea
description: Sweet strawberry fruit tea topped with a rich, savory cheese foam for a delightful contrast.

name: Cheese Foam Mango Tea
description: Tropical mango fruit tea topped with a rich, savory cheese foam for a taste of summer.

name: Uji Matcha Latte
description: A smooth and creamy latte made with high-quality Uji matcha and fresh milk.

name: Fresh Taro Milk Tea
description: A creamy beverage made with fresh taro paste and whole milk for a natural, satisfying taste.

name: Fresh Strawberry Milk Tea
description: A delightful drink made with fresh strawberry puree and creamy whole milk.

name: Soy-Chicken (6 Pieces)
description: Six crispy Korean-style fried chicken wings tossed in a sweet and savory soy-garlic glaze.

name: Soy-Chicken (12 Pieces)
description: Twelve crispy Korean-style fried chicken wings tossed in a sweet and savory soy-garlic glaze.

name: Soy-Chicken (18 Pieces)
description: Eighteen crispy Korean-style fried chicken wings tossed in a sweet and savory soy-garlic glaze.

name: Spicy-Chicken (6 Pieces)
description: Six crispy Korean-style fried chicken wings tossed in a fiery, sweet, and spicy sauce.

name: Spicy-Chicken (12 Pieces)
description: Twelve crispy Korean-style fried chicken wings tossed in a fiery, sweet, and spicy sauce.

name: Spicy-Chicken (18 Pieces)
description: Eighteen crispy Korean-style fried chicken wings tossed in a fiery, sweet, and spicy sauce.

name: Soy-Chicken-Combo
description: 6 Pieces of Chicken Wings with a Drink. Your choice of our sweet and savory soy-garlic wings.

name: Spicy-Chicken-Combo
description: 6 Pieces of Chicken Wings with a Drink. Your choice of our fiery and sweet spicy wings.

name: French Fries
description: Classic, crispy-fried potatoes, lightly salted and served hot. The perfect side for any meal.

name: Popcorn Chicken
description: Bite-sized pieces of chicken, marinated and deep-fried until golden and crispy. A Taiwanese street food classic.

name: Fried Tofu
description: Cubes of firm tofu fried until golden brown and crispy on the outside, soft and silky on the inside.

name: Fried Cuttlefish Balls
description: Savory and bouncy cuttlefish balls, deep-fried to a perfect golden brown.

name: Takoyaki Octopus Balls (6 Pcs)
description: A classic Japanese street food snack; six savory pancake balls filled with octopus, topped with sauce and bonito flakes.

name: Fried Chicken Gizzards
description: A savory and chewy delicacy of chicken gizzards, marinated and fried until crispy.

name: Taiwanese Sausage
description: A sweet and savory grilled pork sausage, a popular and authentic Taiwanese street food.

name: Fried King Oyster Mushroom
description: Thick slices of king oyster mushroom, battered and fried for a meaty texture and savory flavor.

name: Black Tea
description: A simple, classic, and refreshing freshly brewed black tea, served over ice.

name: Jasmine Green Tea
description: A light and aromatic green tea infused with the fragrant essence of jasmine blossoms.

name: Four Season Oolong Tea
description: A light, creamy, and floral oolong tea from Taiwan with a smooth, refreshing finish.

name: Roasted Oolong Tea
description: A full-bodied oolong tea with a toasty, nutty aroma and a rich, earthy flavor.

name: Cloud Black Tea
description: Classic black tea topped with a creamy, lightly salted milk cap for a rich and layered experience.

name: Cloud Green Tea
description: Fragrant jasmine green tea topped with a creamy, lightly salted milk cap.

name: Cloud Oolong Tea
description: Refreshing oolong tea topped with a creamy, lightly salted milk cap for a smooth and unique taste.

name: Cloud Roasted Oolong
description: Rich, toasty oolong tea topped with a creamy, lightly salted milk cap.

name: Orange Yakult
description: A refreshing and tangy drink blending citrusy orange juice with the creamy, probiotic goodness of Yakult.

name: Grapefruit Yakult
description: A zesty and tangy drink combining fresh grapefruit juice with the creamy, probiotic goodness of Yakult.

name: Passion Fruit Yakult
description: A tropical and tangy drink made with passion fruit juice and the creamy, probiotic goodness of Yakult.

name: Taro Tornado
description: A creamy and satisfying ice-blended slush with the sweet, nutty flavor of taro.

name: Matcha Tornado
description: A rich and earthy ice-blended slush made with authentic Japanese matcha green tea.

name: Mango Tornado
